course_title: Con Ed llb for Teaching Parish
class_notes: (Must also enroll in a CEE and an IAM in either Fall or Spring of the same year as Con Ed II) (Students must be available Monday 9:00am-2:00pm; meeting times vary by geographical group)
course_description: Prerequisites: CE551a,b or CE551TPa,b and permission of instructor needed. (Faculty) Second-year MDiv students who are in the Teaching Parish Program may enroll in CE552TPa,b in lieu of CE552a,b. Participants are assigned to student pastor groups in respective districts under the leadership of the teaching parish supervisory pastors: United Methodist ministers who serve as Candler adjunct faculty. Coursework is experiential and collegial in nature, with student-pastors engaging in practice and reflection on a variety of ministerial activities (e.g., preaching, systems analysis, pastoral care, and teaching).
sections: Class Nbr: 5454, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 9a-2p, Instructor: T. Elliott, Status: Open
